# dokploy_backup_destination (Resource)

Manages a Dokploy backup destination (for example an S3 bucket).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dokploy_backup_destination" "hetzner" {
  name              = "Hetzner backup s3 bucket"
  type              = "s3"
  bucket            = "backups-2f6fe75d"
  region            = "nbg1"
  endpoint          = "https://nbg1.your-objectstorage.com"
  access_key_id     = var.backup_destination_access_key
  secret_access_key = var.backup_destination_secret_key
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_key_id` (String, Sensitive) S3 access key ID.
- `bucket` (String)
- `endpoint` (String) S3 endpoint hostname or URL.
- `name` (String)
- `region` (String) Bucket region.
- `secret_access_key` (String, Sensitive) S3 secret access key.

### Optional

- `type` (String) Destination type. Defaults to s3.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
